data.chText: 提升；提拔；晋升
data.enText: a move to a more important job or rank in a company or an organization

data.chText: 竟然提拔她当销售经理，叫每个人都感到意外。
data.enText: Her promotion to Sales Manager took everyone by surprise.

data.chText: 这一新职务对他是擢升。
data.enText: The new job is a promotion for him.

data.chText: 有充分晋升机会的职务
data.enText: a job with excellent promotion prospects

data.chText: （体育运动队的）晋级，升级
data.enText: a move by a sports team from playing in one group of teams to playing in a better group

data.chText: 这个球队晋升为甲级队
data.enText: the team's promotion to the First Division

data.chText: 促销活动；广告宣传
data.enText: activities done in order to increase the sales of a product or service; a set of advertisements for a particular product or service

data.chText: 她的工作主要是销售和广告宣传方面的。
data.enText: Her job is mainly concerned with sales and promotion.

data.chText: 我们正在进行智利葡萄酒特别促销活动。
data.enText: We are doing a special promotion of Chilean wines.

data.chText: 推广；促进
data.enText: activity that encourages people to believe in the value or importance of sth, or that helps sth to succeed

data.chText: 一个促进宗教包容的团体
data.enText: a society for the promotion of religious tolerance

data.text: ad ♦ advertisement ♦ commercial ♦ promotion ♦ advert ♦ trailer

data.chText: 以上各词均指广告、启事。
data.enText: These are all words for a notice, picture or film telling people about a product, job or service.
ad

data.chText: 指广告、启事：
data.enText: ( informal ) a notice, picture or film telling people about a product, job or service

data.chText: 我们在当地报纸上登了一则广告。
data.enText: We put an ad in the local paper.

data.chText: 新品种巧克力棒的广告
data.enText: an ad for a new chocolate bar

data.chText: 他在浏览报纸上的分类广告。
data.enText: He was scanning the classified ads (= the section in a newspaper with small advertisements arranged in groups according to their subject) .
advertisement

data.chText: 指广告、启事、广告样品、宣传的实例、广告活动或广告宣传：
data.enText: a notice, picture or film telling people about a product, job or service; an example of sth that shows its good qualities; the act of advertising sth and making it public

data.chText: 在当地报纸登一则广告来卖汽车。
data.enText: Put an advertisement in the local paper to sell your car.

data.chText: 肮脏的街道绝不是繁荣社会的景象。
data.enText: Dirty streets are no advertisement for a prosperous society.

data.chText: advertisement指广告时可简化为较非正式的ad或advert，指广告样品可简化为advert。
data.enText: When you are talking about a notice, picture or film telling people about a product, job or service, advertisement can be shortened to the more informal ad or ( BrE ) advert . When you are talking about an example of sth that shows its good qualities, advertisement can be shortened to advert .
commercial

data.chText: 指电视或电台播放的广告
data.enText: an advertisement on television or on the radio
promotion

data.chText: 指广告宣传、促销活动：
data.enText: a set of advertisements for a particular product or service; activities done in order to increase the sales of a product or service

data.chText: 当地产品的特别促销活动
data.enText: a special promotion of local products

data.chText: 她从事销售和推广工作。
data.enText: She works in sales and promotion.
advert

data.chText: 指广告、广告样品：
data.enText: ( BrE informal ) an advertisement

data.chText: 我从不看电视广告。
data.enText: I never watch the adverts on TV.
trailer

data.chText: 指电影或电视节目的预告片
data.enText: ( especially BrE ) a series of short scenes from a film/movie or television programme, shown in advance to advertise it
a(n) ad/advertisement/commercial/promotion/advert/trailer for sth
a TV/television/radio/cinema ad/advertisement/commercial/promotion/advert
a job ad/advertisement/advert
to run/show a(n) ad/advertisement/commercial/advert/trailer

tr: act of raising in rank or position

example: his experience in marketing resulted in the forwarding of his career

tr: a message issued in behalf of some product or cause or idea or person or institution
encouragement of the progress or growth or acceptance of something

value.def: If you are given promotion or a promotion in your job, you are given a more important job or rank in the organization that you work for.

example.ex: Consider changing jobs or trying for promotion.
example.tran: 考虑换个工作或者争取升职。

example.ex: ...rewarding outstanding employees with promotions to higher-paid posts.
example.tran: 将出色的员工提升到薪水更高的职位作为奖励

value.def: A promotion is an attempt to make a product or event popular or successful, especially by advertising.

example.ex: During 1984, Remington spent a lot of money on advertising and promotion...
example.tran: 1984年，雷明顿公司在广告和促销方面花费了大量的资金。

example.ex: Ask about special promotions and weekend deals too.
example.tran: 也问一问特别促销和周末特价的情况。

value.tran: （尤指通过广告进行的）促销，推广，推销

trans: 养生；健康教育；健康促进；健康促進；促进健康
投资促进；招商引资；促進投資；促进投资
市场推广；市场营销；营销推广；市场推介；行销推广
中间商促销；贸易促销；商业促销活动；贸易推广；贸易促进
促销策略；促进政策；促销政策；宣传政策
促进出口，出口鼓励，外销推广
联合促销；联合推广；联合促销活动规划；合作促销
优惠代码；优惠码；促销代码；折扣码；促销码
网络炒作节约了大量推广费；推广费

partsOfSpeech.dec: auto 自己 + mob 动 + ile 属于…的 → 自己动的〔车〕→ 汽车
book 书 + mob 动 + ile 表物体 → 动的书 → 流动图书馆
com 加强 + mot 动 + ion 表动作 → 到处都在动 → 动乱
de 非，相反 + mobilize 动员 → 动员〔退伍〕→ 复员
de 向下 + mot 动 + e → 向下动 → 使降级
e 出 + mot 动 + ion 表名词 → 动出〔感情〕→ 感情
im 不 + mobile 活动的，可动的 → 静止的
loco 地方 + mot 动 + ive 表物 → 从一个地方跑到另一个地方的东西 → 火车头
mobb〔= mob〕动 + ish …的 → 乱动的 → 暴乱的
mob 动 + ster 表人 → 匪徒，歹徒
mob 动 + ile 物体 → 活动的，可动的
mob 动 + ility 性质 →〔人〕动起来 → 能动性
mobil〔e〕活动的，可动的 + ize 使… → 使〔人〕动 → 动员
mot 动 + ion 动作或状态 → 运动
mot 动 + ive 表名词 → 动机
motiv〔e〕动机 + ate 使… → 使有动机 → 推动
pro 向前 + mot 动 + e → 向前运动 → 促进
